titleStmt.title: Circes of Iohn Baptista Gello, Florentine. Translated out of Italion into Englishe by Henry Iden
Circe. English
titleStmt.author: Gelli, Giovanni Battista, 1498-1563.
Iden, Henry.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Poules Churchyarde, at the signe of the holy ghost by Iohn Cawood, printer to the Quenes Maiestie],
publicationStmt.date: Anno Domini. M.D.LVII. [1557, i.e. 1558 or 1559?] Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and address from colophon.
Despite the title-page date, evidently printed early in Elizabeth's reign.
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 343 and at reel 1796 (same copy filmed twice).

place.placeName: the signe of the holy ghost
